chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> Prop), (forall x : list A, (forall y : list A, length y < length x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : list A, P a

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Desc_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall x : A, P (x :: nil)) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), Relation_Operators.clos_refl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Desc A leA (l ++ y :: nil) -> P (l ++ y :: nil) -> P ((l ++ y :: nil) ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, Relation_Operators.Desc A leA l -> P l
Forall_Exists_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {Forall P l} + {Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l}
is_set_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), is_set A l -> P l -> ~ In x l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, is_set A l -> P l
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
Forall_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {Forall P l} + {~ Forall P l}
Permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> (forall (x y : A) (l : list A), P (y :: x :: l) (x :: y :: l)) -> (forall l l' l'' : list A, Permutation l l' -> P l l' -> Permutation l' l'' -> P l' l'' -> P l l'') -> forall l l0 : list A, Permutation l l0 -> P l l0
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
list_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
neg_Forall_Exists_neg : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (l : list A), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> ~ Forall P l -> Exists (fun x : A => ~ P x) l
sumbool_rec : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
ForallOrdPairs_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
Forall_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (Q : list A -> Type), Q nil -> (forall (b : A) (l : list A), P b -> Q (b :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> Q l
Inductive Ltl (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Lt_nil : forall (a : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA nil (a :: x) | Lt_hd : forall a b : A, leA a b ->...-> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) Arguments Relation_Operators.Ltl _%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_hd _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_tl _%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
remove : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> A -> list A -> list A
Forall_inv : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (a : A) (l : list A), Forall P (a :: l) -> P a
list_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l l' : list A, {l = l'} + {l <> l'}
Inductive sigT (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) : Type := existT : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A & P x} Arguments sigT [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments existT [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} Arguments sig [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments exist [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
filter_ext_in : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> filter f l = filter g l
map_ext_in : forall (A B : Type) (f g : A -> B) (l : list A), (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a) -> map f l = map g l
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : Forall P nil | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> Forall P (x :: l) Arguments Forall [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Forall_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall_cons [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
Inductive Exists (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Exists_cons_hd : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Exists P (x :: l) | Exists_cons_tl : forall (x : A) (l : list A), Exists P l -> Exists P (x :: l) Arguments Exists [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_hd [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Exists_cons_tl [A]%type_scope [P]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
in_insertion : forall (A : Set) (x : A) (l : list A), In x l -> exists l' : list A, insertion A x l' l
filter_ext_in_iff : forall (A : Type) (f g : A -> bool) (l : list A), filter f l = filter g l < -> (forall a : A, In a l -> f a = g a)
